sections: Hi, I'm Timo. I'm a Software Engineer from Germany, currently living at Lake Constance. I work at Airbus, where I apply my passion for technology and innovation.
I build data centric enterprise applications, focused on analysing and evaluating data quickly. This allows detecting problems early on in the product cycle and saving time and money in the long run.
In my free time I hack together small home projects and I love exploring the world together with my wife. I enjoy trying out new vegetarian food, especially when I'm abroad.

skills.description: I've used Java in everything from small home projects to large scale big data processing systems. It is my favorite language for everything non trivial on the backend

React's simple and painless way of writing frontend code makes it my preferred choice for UI development. The site you're viewing right now was created with it. I've also worked with Angular and Vue in the past.
Docker has been my go-to for easy deployment and management of my applications. Together with docker-compose or Kubernetes it allows me to easily manage my micro service based architectures.
